== Panachikkad (CT) (628178) ==

Panachikkad (CT) is a town in the [[Kottayam]] taluka of [[Kottayam]] district with an area of 23.01 sq. km. and harbouring 11004 households with total population of 43595 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kottayam]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 160 km. Male population is 21370 and female population is 22225. Scheduled Caste population is 2828 and Scheduled Tribes population is 305. Census Location Code of the town is 628178<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 42 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 59 km. Railway station is at Kottayam at a distance of 12 km.
